page.title: 13HOME LIFE
page.content: A DAY IN MY LIFE-NIKKI OSBORNE-27.5.85 We woke up at 7.30.Then we had breakfast and got washed and dressed. Then I watched a little television.Then I went outside to play on my slide and I made a camp out of my climbing frame. I had a very quick lunch.After that dad and I put up the swings then it rained a little so we went in and got ready to go to our friends for tea in Barrow. Their names are Robert,Andrew,Chris and Elizabeth.After eating tea with them we played outside in their garden. Elizabeth (who is 17) looked after us while mum and dad and Mr. and Mrs. Scott went out to see their new house in Dalham.When mum and dad got back they had a meal with Mr. and Mrs. Scott while we played in the playroom.Then we had to go home, it was very late, after 10.00 p.m.I was glad to see my bed.I even think I forgot to say my prayers.
